it.polimi.se2019.controller.weapons.ordered_effects

Class OrderedEffectsWeaponController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.weapons.WeaponController
      • it.polimi.se2019.controller.weapons.ordered_effects.OrderedEffectsWeaponController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThorController

    public abstract class OrderedEffectsWeaponController
extends WeaponController
    This is an abstract marker class, it doesn't have its own methods or attributes and is used to group the weapons in the game based on how they work. Ordered effects weapons have a primary effect and one or more effects that can be applied only if they satisfy particular conditions.
